name: Homefront - Tower Defense
description:
Homefront Tower Defense is a Tower Defense game with elements of Third Person Shooter and Resource Management. It was originally made during the Global Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours.

Features :-

  • Two playable characters.
  • Multiple enemy units with varying  abilities.
  •  Wave based combat system.
  • Procedurally Generated unique stats for each unit.
